title: 2 Quick Ways to Cash Out to a Debit Card on Cash App

steps.title: Open the Cash App app.
steps.content: Open the Cash App app. This looks like a white dollar sign with a green background. Cash App is available to use on iPhone and Android . When you accept money on Cash App, you can leave it in your balance to pay others , or you can transfer it to a linked debit card or bank account.

steps.title: Tap the "Money" tab.
steps.content: Tap the "Money" tab. This is at the bottom-left corner. If you have a balance, you'll see the number.

steps.title: Tap Cash Out.
steps.content: Tap Cash Out . You can find this underneath your Cash Balance .

steps.title: Select an amount to cash out.
steps.content: Select an amount to cash out. Use the slider to adjust the amount you want to send to your debit card. You must have your debit card linked to your Cash App account.

steps.title: Select a deposit speed.
steps.content: Select a deposit speed. Standard deposits arrive within 1 to 3 business days and have no transfer fees. Instant deposits arrive instantly and have a 0.5% to 1.75% fee (with a minimum $0.25 fee). [1] X Research source

steps.title: Confirm with your PIN.
steps.content: Confirm with your PIN. With some devices, you may be able to provide your Touch ID instead. Your money will be transferred.

steps.title: Go to https://cash.app/account in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://cash.app/account in a web browser. If you aren't already logged in, enter your phone number or email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Click Money.
steps.content: Click Money . This will be on the left.

steps.title: Click Cash Out.
steps.content: Click Cash Out . You can find this underneath your Cash Balance .

steps.title: Select an amount and click Continue.
steps.content: Select an amount and click Continue . Click an amount option or enter one manually into the field.

steps.title: Select your bank account and deposit speed.
steps.content: Select your bank account and deposit speed. You must have your debit card linked to your Cash App account. Standard deposits arrive within 1 to 3 business days and have no transfer fees. Instant deposits arrive instantly and have a 0.5% to 1.75% fee (with a minimum $0.25 fee).

steps.title: Click Cash Out.
steps.content: Click Cash Out . This is the green button. Your money will be transferred.
